mapper.insert: insert into member(username, userid, userpwd, nickname, tel, address, email) values (#{username},#{userid},#{userpwd},#{nickname},#{tel},#{address},#{email})
mapper.select: <<<<<<< HEAD <<<<<<< HEAD select userid, username, verify, nickname from member ======= select userid, username, nickname from member >>>>>>> fe8a1ff080a99e0a3164390729c6ef6f3df60003 ======= select userid, username, nickname from member >>>>>>> fe8a1ff080a99e0a3164390729c6ef6f3df60003 where userid=#{userid} and userpwd=#{userpwd}
select count(userid) cnt from member where userid=#{param1}
select count(nickname) cnt from member where nickname=#{parma1}
select userid, warn, username, nickname, tel, email, address from member
select count(email) cnt from member where email=#{param1}
